author: ryan.fitbit
content: hey guys, my company is the first, to my knowledge, OOH media company to form a full-fledged crypto division. We are getting lots of RFPs in for upcoming ETH conferences. I know lots of crypto companies are starting to look at high impact, strategic OOH to get their brand/project in front of real world audiences, b2b, and specifically crypto audiences-what is the best way to share our one-sheet? Would this be the right part of the server? I want to ask first before posting.
